name: Ext_R4B_AdverseEvent_outcome
title: Cross-version Extension for R4B.AdverseEvent.outcome for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents AdverseEvent.outcome from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/AdverseEvent|4.3.0 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: resolved | recovering | ongoing | resolvedWithSequelae | fatal | unknown
element.definition: Describes the type of outcome from the adverse event.
element.comment: `AdverseEvent.outcome` maps to R5 `AdverseEvent.outcome`. Changed from a single value to an array (max cardinality from 1 to *). `outcome` removed the required value set binding to `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/adverse-event-outcome|4.3.0`. So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
